name: RV kitchen unit
description: A small folding vehicle mountable electric camping range and sink unit a lot like it's big brother, but has only a tiny drawer for storage.

name: foldable superalloy frame
description: A small foldable lightweight frame made from pipework.

name: microfridge
description: A tiny fridge for keeping food cool, like a nanoskirt only for comestibles.  You could probably install it on a vehicle.  It's one tenth the size of a minifridge, uses one tenth the electricity, and it's foldable.

name: small vehicle controls
description: A set of various small vehicle controls.  Useful for crafting.

name: small muffler
description: A small muffler like you never see on loud motorcycles.  Very unwieldy as a weapon.  It weighs little and hinges in the middle for folding.

name: dozer bucket
description: A bucket, essentially a large metal plow from a bulldozer for destroying the landscape.  Couldn't possibly be useful for anything else, except maybe plowing through the undead or pushing over trees.

name: microreactor
description: Like it's bigger brother but considerably more compact, generates one tenth the power when supplied with plutonium.

name: sm. sturdy plutonium storage battery
description: A plutonium storage battery, with high capacity, reinforced with sheet metal. Useful for crafting.

name: small plutonium storage battery
description: A small plutonium storage battery, with high capacity. Useful for crafting.

name: reinforced plutonium storage battery
description: A large plutonium storage battery, with very high capacity, reinforced with sheet metal.

name: plutonium storage battery
description: A large plutonium storage battery, with very high capacity.

name: medium electric motor
description: A medium size and moderately powerful electric motor.

name: small plutonium motor
description: A small electric motor that runs off of several plutonium cells.  Gives about as much horsepower as a medium electric motor, but needs a trace of an electrical charge in the batteries to keep running.

name: atomic headlight
description: A plutonium vehicle headlight with a cage built around it to protect it from damage without reducing it's effectiveness.  It doesn't need power to run, because it has built in plutionium cells.

name: atomic foot crank
description: The pedal and gear assembly from a bicycle, with a plutonium cell for extra torque.  It needs a trace amount of charge in the batteries to run.

name: tiny adv. solar panel
description: Electronic device that can convert solar radiation into electric power. Useful for a small vehicle.
